title: Back-end Developer - Java, Kubernetes (Middle/Senior)
description:
Global DTC Pte Ltd helps organizations harness the power of the cloud with automated software solutions focused on making logistics more transparent, convenient, and fast. Our cloud architects are experts in building new cloud applications and migrating legacy systems to the cloud. We focus on Java and JavaScript, Kubernetes technologies to build custom software solutions based on Continuous Delivery - a set of processes and tools based on a combination of Lean and the heavy use of automation

Is automation more than just a VUCA word? Are you comfortable explaining technology to others? Are you passionate about software development at work and at home? If your answer is “yes”, we would like to talk you!

Why you should join Global DTC Pte Ltd:

Keep your skills fresh by working with some of the newest technologies and tools out there
You will get extremely good experience in transportation industry
We are growing! Lots of opportunities for advancement
Join a small, highly collaborative team

What makes Global DTC Pte Ltd unique:

We don't just build software; we approach development as a well-honed craft.
We are experts who believe in being innovative while having fun, and working continuously to refine our skills.
We are committed to excellence in everything we do, from the technology we choose to the people who make up our team. With excellence as a guiding principle, we deliver quality results that ensure client satisfaction.
We approach work with integrity. We do what we say we'll do, and we operate with transparency and honesty.
We work cohesively and see each person at Global DTC Pte Ltd as a critical contributor. We prize teamwork, and support each other in providing the best results for our clients. No one on our team is superior to another - we help each other out, in the spirit of personal growth.

Essential functions and responsibilities:

Provide custom software and Cloud based solutions to our clients
Development of API integration
Developing the world-class software focused on Data centricity
Provide an indexed and searchable interface for users to be able to find media resources like images, videos, etc which contain some specific content

Qualifications Required:

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (or equivalent)
Proven leadership experience – on teams and out in the technical community
7+ years of Java web services/web applications experience
Cloud experience (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, private cloud)
Experience with containers (e.g. Docker)
Experience with ZooKeeper
Experience with Kubernetes (highly preferred)
Postgres, NoSQL experience (e.g. MongoDB) or Graph databases (e.g. Neo4J)
Experience with ORM (e.g. Hibernate)
Modern Build experience with Maven and familiar with continuous integration (e.g. Jenkins, TeamCity) systems
Very comfortable with modern web frameworks (e.g. Spring Boot)
Opinionated on TDD/BDD

Qualifications preferred:

DevOps experience (e.g. Ansible, Kubernetes/Mesos) and infrastructure automation
Comfortable with modern JavaScript technologies and tools
Understanding of secure software development practices

Please visit: Global DTC to learn more about us.

Must be authorized to work in Kazakhstan & No telecommuting

Salary level to be discussed during the interview. Position for full time engagement!
work_format: Формат работы: на месте работодателя или гибрид

title: Senior Data analyst (Assortment)
description:
AUTODOC is the largest and fastest growing auto parts ecommerce platform in Europe.
Present across 27 countries with around 5,000 employees, AUTODOC generated revenue of over €1.3 billion in 2023, supplying more than 7.4 million active customers with its 5.8 million vehicle parts and accessories for car, truck, and motorcycle brands.

Curious minds, adventurous experts and tech-savvy professionals - one team, one billion euros revenue. Catch the ride!

Responsibilities:
1.Analyze, and research sales and user behavior data to provide recommendations and insights.
2.Build solutions to analyze and predict key business metrics.
3. Identify and interpret trends or patterns in large data sets
4. Develop automated and interactive dashboards/reports that support business stakeholders'
needs and allow them to make decisions quickly.
5. Partner with the Data Engineering team to define and build reliable data sources

Qualifications:

3+ years of experience in data or product analytics.
Education in Math, Statistics, Computer Science, Finance, or any related field.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to analyze data and translate it into insights and recommendations.
Comprehensive knowledge of e-commerce area, funnels, and customer journey.
Proficiency in SQL, Python, Excel/Google Sheets.
Proven experience designing and enhancing dashboards and reports using BI tools
Experience with DataBase Clickhouse, certification, e-commerce or automotive domain (desired)

We Offer:

Competitive salaries based on your professional experience
Fast growing international company with stable employment
Annual vacation of 24 days and 1 additional day off on your birthday
Monthly Allowance for cover the costs of medical insurance expenses
Mental Wellbeing Program – the opportunity for free psychological counseling for you and your family members 24/7 hotline and online sessions
Opportunities for advancement, further trainings (over 650 courses on soft and hard skills on our e-learning platform) and coaching
Free English and German language classes
Referral Program with attractive incentives
Flexible working hours and hybrid work

title: Senior SAP Reporting Consultant (BI/BO/BW/SAC/Datasphere)
description:
Key Responsibilities:

System Support & Maintenance:
Provide ongoing support for the existing SAP BI and BO environments, including incident resolution, user assistance, and performance tuning of reports and dashboards.
SAC Development & Management:
Maintain and further develop reports and dashboards in SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC).
Qualtrics Integration & Insights:
Support the use of SAP Qualtrics for customer and employee experience analytics. Help business teams extract, interpret, and apply insights from Qualtrics data effectively.
Collaboration with Stakeholders:
Work closely with business users and functional teams to understand reporting requirements, propose solutions, and support self-service reporting initiatives.
Data Integration:
Support and improve existing data integration flows between SAP and non-SAP systems used in reporting.
Issue Resolution & Troubleshooting:
Identify and resolve issues related to data accuracy, report logic, and system performance.
Training & Enablement:
Conduct training sessions and provide guidance to business users and junior team members on using BI/BO tools effectively.

Required Qualifications:

Experience:
7+ years of experience in SAP BI/BO environments
Technical Expertise:
Advanced skills in SAP BusinessObjects (Web Intelligence, Crystal Reports, BO Dashboards).
Strong experience with SAP Analytics Cloud (reporting, dashboard design, data modeling).
Solid background in SAP BW, SAP HANA, and BEx Queries.
Proficiency in SQL and data analysis across SAP and non-SAP sources.
Qualtrics Experience:
Hands-on experience working with SAP Qualtrics, understanding its data model and integration with BI tools is a plus.
Analytical & Problem-Solving Skills:
Ability to translate business questions into technical solutions and meaningful dashboards or reports.
Communication Skills:
Strong verbal and written communication skills. Able to explain complex reporting concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Education:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business Analytics, or a related field. SAP certifications are a strong advantage.

Preferred Qualifications:

SAP certifications in BI, BO, SAC, or BW/4HANA.
Knowledge of SAP Datasphere, Embedded Analytics

Personal Attributes:

Detail-oriented with a passion for data quality and visualization.
Proactive and self-motivated with a continuous improvement mindset.
Strong interpersonal skills and a collaborative working style.

title: SAP FI Consultant
description:
Responsibilities:

Provide ongoing support and maintenance for SAP FI modules (General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Asset Accounting) to ensure smooth and accurate financial operations within the organization.
Support integration between SAP FI and SAP Controlling (CO), ensuring seamless data flow for cost management for upstream oil operations.
Assist in the configuration and maintenance of Joint Venture Accounting (JVA) within SAP FI, ensuring proper handling of joint venture transactions, cost allocations, and settlements in line with industry standards.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure integration of SAP FI with Materials Management (MM) and Project Systems (PS), facilitating accurate inventory valuation, project accounting, and financial reporting.
Work closely with SAP SuccessFactors and SAP Human Capital Management to ensure proper integration of employee-related financial data (e.g., payroll, benefits) into SAP FI for correct financial processing.
Support the creation and delivery of financial reports using SAP BW, SAC and BI/BO, ensuring that all stakeholders have timely access to accurate financial data for decision-making.
Provide assistance in the implementation of new business requirements for finance, ensuring that the SAP FI modules are configured to meet evolving business needs and industry requirements.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to SAP FI functionality, ensuring quick resolution of any discrepancies in financial transactions, reporting, or integrations with other SAP modules.
Support month-end, quarter-end, and year-end closing activities, ensuring timely and accurate financial reporting, reconciliation, and compliance with accounting standards.
Offer training and guidance to end-users on SAP FI functionality, helping teams understand and utilize SAP features to improve financial processes and reporting.

Skills:

In-depth knowledge of SAP FI (Financial Accounting), with expertise in General Ledger (GL), Accounts Payable (AP), and Asset Accounting (AA), ensuring efficient and accurate financial operations.
Proficiency in Joint Venture Accounting (JVA) within SAP, including managing settlements and cutbacks, and handling joint venture cost-sharing arrangements specific to the oil and gas industry.
Strong understanding of IFRS and GAAP financial standards, ensuring compliance with international and local accounting requirements for financial reporting and management.
Experience with SAP Controlling (CO), including cost center accounting, internal orders, and profitability analysis, ensuring effective integration with SAP FI for accurate cost management and reporting.
Expertise in SAP Materials Management (MM) and integration with SAP FI for seamless procurement, inventory valuation, and financial accounting processes in upstream oil operations.
Knowledge of SAP Project Systems (PS), including project costing, budgeting, and integration with SAP FI and CO for managing financials related to capital projects in the oil and gas sector.
Experience with SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM integration with SAP FI for the accurate transfer of employee-related financial data, including payroll and benefits, into the SAP financial ecosystem.
Proficiency in SAP BW and BI/BO reporting for delivering real-time, accurate financial reporting solutions to stakeholders, ensuring transparency and insightful decision-making.
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills for resolving discrepancies in financial transactions, integration issues, and system functionality across SAP modules.
Ability to collaborate with business stakeholders to define and deliver new business requirements for finance, ensuring that SAP FI modules are configured to meet evolving business needs, particularly in the context of joint venture operations.
Familiarity with SAP S/4HANA implementation processes, understanding the transition from SAP ECC to S/4HANA and ensuring that SAP FI modules are prepared for future upgrades and enhancements.

Experience:

Experience in supporting and configuring SAP FI modules, specifically General Ledger (GL), Accounts Payable (AP), and Asset Accounting (AA), to ensure smooth financial operations within the company.
Hands-on experience with Joint Venture Accounting (JVA) in SAP, including the ability to handle settlements, cutbacks, and joint venture cost-sharing agreements in the upstream oil industry.
Experience working with IFRS and GAAP accounting standards, ensuring the financial transactions and reports comply with international and local regulatory requirements.
Proven ability to integrate SAP FI with SAP Controlling (CO), including managing cost centers, internal orders, and profitability analysis, to ensure accurate financial data across departments.
Experience with SAP Materials Management (MM) and its integration with SAP FI, ensuring accurate inventory valuation, procurement, and financial accounting processes.
Experience implementing and supporting SAP Project Systems (PS), including project costing, budgeting, and integration with SAP FI for financial management of oil and gas capital projects.
Experience integrating SAP SuccessFactors and SAP HCM with SAP FI, ensuring seamless data flow of employee-related financial data (e.g., payroll, benefits, compensation) into the financial accounting system.
Hands-on experience with SAP BW and BI/BO reporting, providing timely and accurate financial reports for internal stakeholders and ensuring data transparency for decision-making.
Experience with troubleshooting and resolving financial system issues, including discrepancies in financial data, SAP FI integration errors, and ensuring smooth operations across all relevant SAP modules.
Proven ability to deliver new business requirements for finance, working closely with business stakeholders to ensure SAP FI configurations meet evolving business needs and ensure compliance with financial regulations in the oil and gas sector.
Experience with SAP S/4HANA implementation or migration projects, preparing SAP FI configurations for the transition from ECC to S/4HANA, ensuring smooth upgrade processes and future system enhancements.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, Information Systems, or a related field; advanced certifications or professional qualifications (e.g., CPA, ACCA) are a plus.
SAP Certified in Financial Accounting (FI), with strong expertise in General Ledger (GL), Accounts Payable (AP), and Asset Accounting (AA).
Experience and knowledge of IFRS and GAAP accounting standards, with the ability to ensure compliance in financial reporting and transactions within the oil and gas sector.
Proven experience in Joint Venture Accounting (JVA) within SAP, particularly in handling settlements and cutbacks, and integrating JVA with other SAP modules.
Experience in integrating SAP FI with SAP Controlling (CO), Materials Management (MM), Project Systems (PS), and SAP BW/BI/BO, with a deep understanding of financial reporting and data analytics.
Experience with SAP S/4HANA and ECC6 migration projects, with a focus on preparing SAP FI modules for S/4HANA transition, ensuring system readiness and compatibility.

title: SAP BPC/BW consultant
company: ТОО IBA Astana Dev (АйБиЭй Астана Дев)
description:
Мы в поисках опытного SAP BPC консультанта для действующего проекта в АО "НАК Казатомпром". Полная загрузка 100%, без командировок. Рабочий язык - русский.

Обязанности:

Поддержка существующего решения на SAP BPC (SAP BPC 10.1/11 Embedded/Standard)

Решение инцидентов и проблем пользователей (L3 поддержка)

Анализ и исправление ошибок в отчетности и процессах консолидации

Разработка новых отчетов в SAP BPC и SAP BW (при необходимости)

Работа с запросами изменений (Change Requests)

Взаимодействие с ключевыми пользователями и командой поддержки

Документирование изменений и исправлений

Требования:

4+ лет опыта в поддержке или внедрении решений SAP BPC (Embedded или Standard)

Уверенные навыки работы с SAP BW (создание/поддержка инфообъектов, DSO, кубов, трансформаций)

Навыки проведения анализа инцидентов, локализации и исправления ошибок

Понимание интеграции SAP BPC с другими модулями SAP (FI, CO)

Способность писать техническую документацию на русском языке

Плюсом будет:

Опыт работы в проектах крупных промышленных холдингов

Опыт настройки Business Process Flows (BPF) в SAP BPC

Базовое знание SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC)

Условия:
самостоятельная работа в проектной среде (без обучения с нуля)
обсуждаемый формат работы (удаленно или офис)
employment_type:
Проект или разовое задание
Возможно временное оформление

title: Бизнес-аналитик (управление данными)
description:
Обязанности:

​​​​​​- Участие в проектах по внедрению Master Data Management (MDM) и Data Governance (DG) систем.
- Проведение предпроектного обследования: сбор, анализ и структурирование требований заказчика.
- Анализ существующих процессов управления данными и разработка предложений по их оптимизации.
- Подготовка функциональных и технических требований (ТЗ) для реализации решений в области MDM/DG.
- Построение моделей данных и описание бизнес-процессов.
- Взаимодействие с бизнес-подразделениями и техническими командами (архитекторы, разработчики).
- Поддержка команды разработки на этапе реализации и сопровождения решений.
- Участие в тестировании решений на соответствие требованиям.

Требования:

​​​​​​- Опыт работы на проектах внедрения MDM и/или Data Governance — обязателен.
- Практический опыт проведения предпроектных обследований: интервьюирование, анализ текущих процессов, выявление требований.
- Опыт написания технических заданий и другой проектной документации.
- Понимание архитектуры MDM-систем и принципов интеграции с корпоративными системами.
- Знание основных концепций управления данными.

Мы предлагаем:

- Хорошая зарплата

- Выплата премии

-​​​​​​​ Работа над интересными проектами

-Обучение и развитие

- Комфортные условия труда

- Работа в команде единомышленников

title: Специалист по информационной безопасности (Fintech, English) / Informational Security Officer
description:
Collect Group Holdings is a progressive group of fintech companies founded in 2017. Our mission is to revolutionize the way businesses manage customer relationships. We strive for innovation and excellence, specializing in the development of cutting-edge fintech and blockchain platforms.

Our companies:

Collect & Pay

Collect & Exchange

Capital Pay

Vacancy: Information Security Specialist
Location: Republic of Kazakhstan, Astana
Work format: Office

The Information Security Officer (ISO) is responsible for establishing and maintaining the company’s information security program, ensuring that information assets and associated technologies, applications, systems, infrastructure, and processes are protected in accordance with regulatory, legal, and business requirements of the Republic of Kazakhstan and international standards. This role will play a crucial part in compliance with AIFC regulations, enhancing organizational cybersecurity readiness and resilience.

Key Responsibilities

Ensure compliance with Kazakhstani laws, including: Law on Informatization, Law on Personal Data and Their Protection, Law on Payments and Payment Systems, Rules for Organizing the Activities of Payment Organizations (NBK Resolution).


Lead internal information security awareness training and phishing simulation campaigns.


Coordinate and execute response protocols for malware infections, unauthorized access attempts, and suspicious financial transactions.


Manage vulnerability identification and remediation; establish preventive security controls.


Maintain comprehensive logs and records of security incidents and events; generate internal and regulatory reports as required.


Assist in external and internal audits, ensuring continued compliance with standards such as ISO/IEC 27001 and PCI DSS.


Support IT infrastructure teams to ensure secure and resilient technology operations aligned with legal and business expectations.


Perform security risk assessments and contribute to ongoing risk management planning.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Information Security, Computer Science, Cybersecurity, or related field.


Minimum 3–5 years of experience in an information security role, preferably within fintech, banking, or payment institutions.


Strong knowledge of Kazakhstani information security laws and regulations.


Experience working with or within regulatory bodies (e.g., AIFC) is an asset.


Industry certifications preferred (e.g., CISSP, CISM, ISO 27001 Lead Implementer, CEH).


Knowledge of international standards (ISO/IEC 27001, PCI DSS) and risk frameworks (e.g., NIST, COBIT).


Fluency in Kazakh and/or Russian; English proficiency desirable for regulatory communication.

What do we offer?

You will have the status of an employee at a tech company with great growth potential, a very long runway, and large, growing markets

Competitive salary and stable working conditions

Career and professional development opportunities

Paid lunches

Engaging tasks that will help you grow

A friendly team with no unnecessary formalities and hierarchy

Opportunity for additional company-sponsored training
skills: Информационная безопасность,Английский язык,Аудит,Аудит информационной безопасности,Английский — B2 — Средне-продвинутый

Experience working with or within regulatory bodies (e.g., AIFC) is an asset.


Industry certifications preferred (e.g., CISSP, CISM, ISO 27001 Lead Implementer, CEH).


Knowledge of international standards (ISO/IEC 27001, PCI DSS) and risk frameworks (e.g., NIST, COBIT).


Fluency in Kazakh and/or Russian; English proficiency desirable for regulatory communication.

What do we offer?

You will have the status of an employee at a tech company with great growth potential, a very long runway, and large, growing markets

Competitive salary and stable working conditions

Career and professional development opportunities

Paid lunches

Engaging tasks that will help you grow

A friendly team with no unnecessary formalities and hierarchy

Opportunity for additional company-sponsored training

title: Senior Planning Specialist
description:
Обязанности:
Provide planning & reporting services to project teams to ensure proper project planning, reporting and resource management.
Develops and ensures effective and successful Management Level (Levels 1 and 2) and Performance Level (Levels 3 and 4) project plans/schedules for all phases of project, including the FEED, Engineering, Procurement and Construction phases.
Performs logic network planning using the Critical Path Method (CPM) for the development of all plans and schedules with Basis of Schedule documents.
Develops appropriate plans/schedules and monitors and updates plans/schedules for the project from the start through Close-Out
Ensures appropriate physical progress measurement set up and regular updates for the project.
Prepare resource and progress reports to reflect the agreed budget for the work and in line with the developed Work Breakdown Structure.
Coordinates preparation of projects Progress Reporting and Management information packs.
Implementation and development when required of Planning and Reporting related Processes and Procedures,
To develop project schedules from summary to detailed level which optimize expenditure of time, resource utilization and cost.
Prepare and update on a weekly basis a Progress Calculation Report. Undertake calculation of progress, Schedule Performance Index and productivity statistics.
Analysis, forecasting and manage the Company Projects schedules, resource budgets, productivity and other KPI’s as one entity. Compilation and analysis of historical planning, productivity and resource data.
To identify and addresses areas of concern and project schedule risk and subsequent recovery action to minimize adverse trends.
Update the Planned, Committed, Expended and Estimated to Complete values.
Undertake regular reviews of the schedules and progress reports to identify any trends, variations or concerns.
Support all Project Service teams of planning, cost control, cost estimate and document controls when required.
Trains junior staff on their responsibilities, advises on best practices and ensures proper norms and methods are followed.
Demonstrate a commitment to achieving of Company standards and procedures and development planning and scheduling check lists and procedures.
To provide information to Senior Management to enable a project to be managed effectively.
Undertake ad hoc reviews and analysis as directed by Project Service Management, Planning and Cost Control team leads.
Требования:

Solid knowledge of all phases of project, including the FEED, Engineering, Procurement and Construction phases.
Must have knowledge and experience of Project Control, Planning and Reporting disciplines.
Knowledge of computer based systems including, good knowledge of PRIMAVERA P6 and MS Project, ERP systems, Database Management systems, Excel, Power BI, Word, Microsoft Office or equivalent software packages.
Education: Bachelor degree in engineering is minimum requirement. Master degree preferred
Language skills: English and Russian are mandatory. Kazakh is advantageous
Professional experience: Min 10 years – technical experience in planning

Условия:
Atyrau, 5/2

title: Systems Engineer
company: ТОО Wabtec Corporation, ТМ (Филиал компании «Транспортейшн Глоубэл Эл-Эл-Си»в Республике Казахстан)
description:
Role summary:

The purpose of this role is to lead all the Engine & Fuel system integration activities related to the customer requirements, and delivery of new engines to the international customers with a primary focus on customers in Kazakhstan and CIS region.

This role includes customer interface, requirement management, monitoring subsystem development, Engine integration, build support, in country validation, commissioning and launch support.

This role has the responsibility to work collaboratively and strategically with globally diverse stakeholders to deliver best in class product configuration meeting business objectives and customer requirement. This role is also responsible for shaping the product considering reuse, leveraging standardization, modularization in consultation with product management and other cross functions.

Responsibilities:

Engine & Fuel system integration with locomotive
Responsibility to execute & deliver locomotive product for international customers meeting cost, quality, and schedule
Lead engine emissions and fuel consumption in country testing
Lead certification efforts with certification team and collaborate with 3rd party certification agency’s
Understand product requirements, operating environment, and regulations
Interface with Program Management Office, Supply Chain and develop integrated schedule
Communicate project status, schedules, upcoming deliverables, risks, issues, and technical solutions between various stakeholders. Method of communications to include, but not limiting to, design reviews, operational reviews, and team meetings.
Identify detailed validation requirements, drill down for subsystems, planning and execution
Support Prototype locomotive build and manage product changes till customer acceptance
Identify risk and provide mitigation plan by working cross functionally
Identify and Lead productivity efforts and support margin improvement team
Support localization efforts
Subsystem Engineering validation at loco level, customer demonstration test at build locations, conduct trials on customer track, commissioning & customer documentation
Document technical data generated by the assigned project per engineering policies and procedures
Embrace culture of Collaboration, Innovation, Customer Centricity, Safety, Compliance, Cost & Schedule
Partner with cross functional team in driving customer discovery session to incorporate learning from past projects, field & operational experience in country.
Partner with cross functional team in driving post project evaluation to document project learning to be used in future programs
Support sourcing, manufacturing, and other cross-functional teams throughout the product life cycle

title: Data Scientist (CV)
description:
Мы ищем специалиста в области Computer Vision, который поможет нам в быстром генерировании и тестировании гипотез для разработки и поддержки инновационных продуктов. Откликайся ❤️

Обязанности:

Разработка продуктов компьютерного зрения

Оптимизация работы существующих CV-решений

R&D по разработке новых CV-продуктов

Взаимодействие с заказчиком

Требования:

Опыт работы в области компьютерного зрения: задачи сегментирования, детекции, OCR и т.д.;

Опыт работы с библиотеками и фреймворками для компьютерного зрения, такими как OpenCV, TensorFlow, PyTorch, и других.

Опыт работы с библиотеками аугментации Albumentations/imgaug/etc.

Навыки коммуникации и способность работать в команде

Ответственность и мотивация в работе

Опыт в CV и глубоком обучении.

Будет плюсом:

Базовые знания стека технологий для MLOps (Docker, git, gitlab/github, CI/CD, FastAPI/Flask)
Знание С++
Опыт оптимизации скорости работы нейросетей (ONNX, ONNX Runtime, OpenVINO, TensorRT)
Промышленный опыт разработки технологий, связанный с компьютерным зрением

Навыки back-end разработки приветствуются.

Наши условия ниже:)

title: Business Development specialist
description:
Key Responsibilities:

Tender support: track relevant tenders through the tender platforms and other external sources, participate in submission process and ensure compliance with requirements and deadlines.
Internal communications: Act as a key point of contact for the team on business development activities.

Up to 3 years experience in business administration, business development, marketing, sales
Attention to details, proactivity
English - upper-intermediate

title: Специалист поддержки DCS
description:
Обязанности:
Развивать и поддерживать отказоустойчивость промышленных систем DCS, IED.
Оперативно реагировать на аварийные ситуации в работе систем DCS, IED.
Принимать оперативные меры по восстановлению систем DSC, IED при их сбоях или выходе строя.
Выявлять неисправности и решать вопросы, связанные с обеспечением соответствующего уровня производительности промышленных систем.
Проводить тестирование и ремонт неисправного оборудования.
Выполнять работы в подключении, тестировании и модификации ПЛК/Scada перед внедрением.
Анализировать причины неполадок и неисправностей системы, вносить предложения по их устранению и профилактики, улучшать качество и надежность промышленных систем управления и электроснабжения (DCS, IED).
Поддержка, устранении неполадок ПЛК, систем DCS 800хА, MicroSCADA, сетей Profibus и Modbus, а также сети ЕС61850 и соответствующем оборудовании.
Содействовать ежедневному, еженедельному и ежемесячному планированию работ и мероприятий по электрическим и промышленным системам.
Расследовать аварий и повреждения систем.
Создавать, внедрять и тестировать планы аварийного восстановления систем DCS, IED.
Производить установку и техническое обслуживание программного обеспечения систем управления DCS, IED.
Проводить контрольные проверки работоспособности и эффективности действующих систем и технических средств мониторинга и реагирования, разрабатывать предложения по совершенствованию и повышению эффективности принимаемых мер.
Участвовать в процессе принятия решений о внедрении или модернизации компонентов DCS, IED систем.
Взаимодействовать со сторонними компаниями по вопросам, связанным с обеспечением доступа, работоспособности промышленных систем управления и электроснабжения (DCS, IED).
Подготовка и введение организационно-распорядительной документации:
Разработка политик, процедур, регламентов компании по эксплуатации, развитию/расширению систем промышленной связи.
Требования:
Опыт работы в проектировании, внедрении и/или обслуживании систем управления систем автоматизации, SCADA.
Знание принципов построения, особенностей проектирования, внедрения, эксплуатации систем DCS (distributed control system), IED (Intelligent Electronic Device).
Знание стандартов и протоколов систем DCS, IED.
Опыт ведения проектов в области DCS, практический опыт в реализации крупных проектов.
Умение составлять технические задания, технические и эксплуатационные документации.
Работа со сторонними организациями (вендорами, поставщики и др.).
Желание и возможность проявить себя в условиях поддержки существующего бизнеса и развития новых технологий.
Продвинутые знания в области АСУТП: Понимание ключевых аспектов автоматизации технологических процессов горнорудный предприятий. металлургии и специфики работы меднообогатительных комбинатов.
Экспертиза в системах ABB: Глубокие теоретические и практические знания систем ABB 800xA и MicroSCADA Pro, включая продвинутые функции, настройку, масштабирование и интеграцию с другими системами.
Опыт работы с промышленными коммуникационными протоколами, используемыми в АСУТП, такими как IEC 61850, IEC 60870-5-101/104, Modbus TCP/RTU, PROFIBUS и PROFINET.
Умение программировать и конфигурировать системы управления ABB с использованием инструментов программирования (например, Control Builder M) и знание языков программирования, таких как IEC 61131-3.
Управление электрическими сетями: Понимание принципов управления и мониторинга электрическими сетями, включая распределенные системы автоматизации подстанций (SAS) и системы управления дистрибутивной энергетикой (DMS).
Знание сетевых технологий Cisco: Глубокое понимание и практический опыт работы с линейкой промышленного оборудования Cisco, включая маршрутизаторы, коммутаторы и МСЭ, на уровне сертификации CCNP или выше. Это включает в себя, но не ограничивает, знание архитектуры промышленной сети, протоколов PTP, CIP, MODBUS TCP, IGMP, PIM, MLD, VLAN, QoS и т.д. и принципов построения высокозащищенных промышленных сетей.
Разработка и внедрение сетевых решений: Способность разрабатывать и реализовывать сетевые решения, соответствующие требованиям промышленной безопасности и надежности. Это включает создание и поддержку сетевой документации, планирование масштабируемости сети, а также анализ и устранение узких мест производительности.
Опыт формирования и оформления технических спецификаций.
Навыки по устранению неполадок в работе промышленных сетей.
Знание нормативно-правовой базы РК и международных стандартов в области АСУТП в горнорудной отрасли.
Условия:
График 5/2;
Медицинское страхование.

title: Payroll Specialist
Risk and Internal Controls Specialist in Audit Department (Astana)
description:
KPMG is searching for Risk and Internal Controls Specialist in Audit Department

As a Risk and Internal Controls Specialist, you will:

Create and set up controls in the QTracker system.

Monitor the timely submission of controls according to the approved plan.

Fill in controls in the system as needed.

Communicate internally, primarily with employees of the Audit department.

Assist with analyzing risks, preparing reports, and ensuring compliance with internal control standards.

Support risk management efforts and help with internal audits.

Contribute to the development and improvement of internal audit processes.

You’re the perfect match for this role if you:

Have at least 1 year of experience in risk management, internal audit, or related areas, preferably within a consulting or audit firm.

Have a good understanding of internal controls and risk management practices.

Are proficient in spoken and written English (B2 or higher).

Possess strong communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills.

Are able to work effectively in a team environment and maintain attention to detail in all tasks.

Diversity & Inclusion Statement

We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment regardless of their unique abilities, background, or identity.
